Subject: URGENT: Payment of Overdue Invoice Required Immediately

Dear [Customer],

I hope this email finds you well. We would like to bring to your attention that there is an outstanding invoice for invoice number #123456 that is now 30 days overdue. We kindly request that you settle this invoice immediately to avoid any further complications.

As a valued customer, we understand that oversights can happen and we are here to assist you in resolving this matter promptly. Please find attached a copy of the invoice for your reference.

To expedite the payment process, we kindly ask that you make the payment through our secure online portal or via bank transfer using the details provided in the attached invoice. If you have already made the payment, please disregard this message and accept our apologies for any inconvenience caused.

Please be aware that failure to settle this invoice within the next 48 hours may result in additional late fees and possible suspension of services. We value our partnership with you and hope to continue doing business together in the future.

Thank you for your immediate attention to this matter. If you have any questions or require further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact our Accounts Receivable department at [phone number] or [email address].

We appreciate your prompt response and cooperation in resolving this issue.

Warm regards,

[Vendor Name]
